terms.blue-green deployment: Deployment strategy maintaining two identical production environments
terms.traffic switch: Atomic redirection of user traffic between environments
terms.expand-contract pattern: Database migration approach maintaining backward compatibility
terms.zero-downtime: System availability during deployment without service interruption
terms.instant rollback: Ability to revert to previous version within seconds
terms.connection draining: Process of allowing existing connections to complete before terminating a process
terms.graceful reload: Reloading a service's configuration without dropping in-flight connections
terms.idempotent: Running the same operation multiple times yields the same result as running it once
terms.backward compatibility: Property where older application versions work with a newer database schema
terms.canary analysis: Gradual, data-driven validation of new releases with a subset of traffic
terms.feature flags: Runtime toggles for code paths that decouple deployment from feature activation
terms.multi-region deployment: Geographically distributed deployment across multiple regions for disaster recovery and latency reduction
terms.auto-rollback: Automatic reversion to previous version based on metric thresholds
